desc: Constantine Creations is a family-owned jewelry business with a private showroom located in Covina, California that has been in business since 1985. We create custom pieces of jewelry out of rare and exotic gemstones such as Tanzanite, Tourmaline, Alexandrite, Aquamarine, Spinel, Opal, Emeralds and Diamonds!

layout.text: Natural Pearls are One of the World's Rarest Jewels
Birthstone of the Month: June is Pearl!
